channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report E-2024010467
item.description:
Report E-2024010467

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-30T15:10:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-02
  • City: MISSOULA
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 1 pound of sodium hydroxide (UN1823) released from the paper bag due to being sideswiped by other freight. The release impacted the pallet and on the dock. The SDS was reviewed with the terminal and ultimately it was determined that terminal personnel were capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. (1) 5 gallon DF containing paper bag with product was created as waste and left onsite for the terminal to manage.
